title: Mercury Transit in the 7th House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 7th house for Sagittarius Ascendant, communication becomes central to partnerships, agreements, and public interactions. Dialogue with spouse, business partners, and clients increases, making this a strong phase for negotiations and collaborations. Logical discussion helps resolve misunderstandings, though over-analysis or argumentative speech can strain relationships. When approached with balance and listening, this transit supports mutually beneficial deals, clearer commitments, and improved harmony in one-to-one connections.
closing: This Mercury transit emphasizes dialogue in partnerships. With balance, it supports fair agreements, clear communication, and harmonious one-to-one relationships.
